summary: A feature-length documentary about the making of Kevin Smith's Clerks (1994) and the commercial success that followed.
cast: Kevin Smith|Grace Smith|Ernest O'Donnell|Mike Belicose|Bryan Johnson|Walter Flanagan|Ed Hapstak|Jason Mewes|Vincent Pereira|Scott Mosier|David Klein|Jeff Anderson|Peter Broderick|Joe Bagnole|Brian O'Halloran|Marilyn Ghigliotti|Robert Hawk|Amy Taubin|John Pierson|Janet Pierson|John Willyung|Mark Tusk|Jonathan Gordon|Geoffrey Gilmore|Harvey Weinstein|Emelda Mae|Janet Maslin
keywords: making of|movie connection in title|colon in title|six word title
title: Snowball Effect. The Story of Clerks
